nodes.text: Yokado was a Chiss male who held the title of Patriarch of the Coduyo family.

The Chiss mid-ager Yoponek once told his betrothed Yomie and their traveling companion Haplif of a time when Xodlak family Councilor Lakuviv attempted to manipulate Patriarch Yokado. Yoponek said that, despite the alliance between the Xodlak and the Coduyo, Xodlak Councilors had a fairly common pattern of seeking to manipulate Coduyo Patriarchs.
